summary: The customer was interested in switching to Contoso Wireless for their internet service. The customer service agent explained the benefits of the service, such as unlimited data, fast speeds, and reliable connections, as well as their excellent customer service team. They discussed the different plans available and the cost associated with each. The customer was also informed of the low churn rate, special offers and discounts for new customers, and the one-time setup fee of $50. Finally, they provided information on how to sign up and start enjoying their services.
